comment: The smoothest, creamiest Irish single malt I have ever run across. At 53% alcohol there is little to no burn and that number helps evaorate a melody of oils and flavors. A must have for any Irish Whiskey fan and once you tate it the Copper Pot just feels watered down.
Nose:fruity, vanilla, honey. taste: Very short finish, orange zest, some peppery spice. the more I drink it, the sooner I want to stop.
Citrusy. Not sure what release it was.
